data.name: Doodle God Universe
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist


Check Out More Doodle Games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/348360
http://store.steampowered.com/app/598940
http://store.steampowered.com/app/608760


About the Game

Hello, Creator. Welcome to the Cosmos!
You have four basic elements, an empty planet and plenty of time. Not that these are alone are enough to create the Universe. You will also have to use your intelligence and imagination as you combine air, water, fire and earth to create hundreds of new elements to make your planet come alive!

BUILD THE WHOLE WORLD

Mix and match different combinations of elements to create an entire universe. As you create each new element, watch your 3D planet come alive in amazing animation.

HAVE FUN & LEARN

Every time you successfully create a new item you’ll be rewarded with the wit and wisdom of some of the greatest philosophers and comedians of all time.
And the Voice will encourage you to keep creating things.

SIDE QUESTS

Take a chance to find new elements and explore magical worlds in which you will have to save the princess from the dragon, recreate Halloween and help Santa with Christmas gifts.

  • EVOLUTION+ MODE

    Complete the main game & open all the elements to unlock this NEW mode. New Game+ mode: Re-play the game from the beginning as a Pro. Find missing reactions & get up to 250,000 bonus points. Earn extra points for each new reaction you missed during the 1st gameplay. Be a Hero & become the Doodle God Universe Champion!

  • LEADERBOARD

    Each new element, reaction or hint usage is rewarded with the points which can help you to increase your value as a creator in the Global Leaderboard.

data.short_description: You have four basic elements, an empty planet and plenty of time. Not that these are alone are enough to create the Universe. You will also have to use your intelligence and imagination as you combine air, water, fire and earth to create hundreds of new elements to make your planet come alive!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Doodle God is about as simple, accessible, and gorgeously presentable a game as you’re going to find...I absolutely LOVED every second of it.”
4.5/5 – AppSafari

“Doodle God is actually that rarest of things, a game that refuses to fit into any single genre and so has instead created its own. But you still find yourself pondering philosophically as you try to reverse-engineer millions of years of human evolution.”
App of the Day – EuroGamer

“JoyBits have nailed time-wasting to a fine art with Doodle God and with more updates planned you can expect to get great value and fun for your money. Be prepared to lose an afternoon with this game, it's just that powerful.”
80/100 – AppSpy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
